Articles.Content:
Been playing since 0.21.1 was released. I had never heard of the game until this XKCD. I downloaded the demo, got hooked, and bought the game the next payday. Since then, I've been lurking here and over at /r/kerbalspaceprogram (which I only joined because the forums were down.)

So, I thought I'd finally say hi.

Hi.
Hi there madbadger! What are your achievements so far?
Highlights include an Apollo-style mission to Duna, a dual probe, single launch to Eve, and my "Whoops, I guess I should have brought a boat" Laythe "landing."

Highlights include an Apollo-style mission to Duna, a dual probe, single launch to Eve, and my "Whoops, I guess I should have brought a boat" Laythe "landing."

wow that is incredible!!! I still have a hard time going to laythe or duna, where do you get your fuel?

where do you get your fuel?

? From the propulsion tab? I'm not sure what you're asking...
